title: Anyone got an airport?
content:
I just got an airport extreme, but my airport set up assistant can't see the card... any idea's?   
   
Thanks   
   
Jim
author: union

comments.content:
[http://www.plus613.com/image/662](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127093532/http:/www.plus613.com/image/662)   
   
I think it's extreme, but I'm not sure.   
   
Si
Todd Dominey mentioned some Airport Extreme issues in his [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127093532/http:/whatdoiknow.org/)

Did you double check that little attachment wire? Mine set up seamlessly once I got everything connected, but I struggled with that wire at first. It was the only component that didn't feel right when I attached it, even though it was.   
   
By the way, is this on a tower or a laptop?
its a G4, I think maybe the connection in the G4 is damaged. the strange thing is that the CDROM drive doesn't work when the airport card is pluged in!
Hmmm. That's bad news. Perhaps you have a power supply problem. If not enough power is going to the machine, it may only have enough for a few components. That's just a shot in the dark, though.
i had a problem with mine where with the airport card in i got kernel panics. with it out it booted fine. turned out it was a duff card from apple
